ANALYZE: Use BridgeBoards to analyze played boards:

HOWTO.LI1: Paste link to the pairs tournament personal scorecard or match results and press button 'LOAD'.
HOWTO.LI2: Gallery with your results will be generated.
HOWTO.LI3: Send the generated link to your partner or team partners.
HOWTO.LI4: Everyone who receives the link to your gallery may add comments to the boards.

SAMPLES: Sample galleries (option to comment has been blocked)

MYWEBARY.DESC2: and take advantage of many additional options such as:
MYWEBARY.LI1: Receive notifications about new comments to your galleries.
MYWEBARY.LI2: Easy access to the history of all your galleries created on BridgeBoards.com pinned to your account.
MYWEBARY.LI3: Only registered users can delete their comments.

FAQ.TITLE: FAQ:
FAQ.Q1: How to add colours of cards to the comments?

A1.CONTENT: Add ! and the first letter of the name of the bidden colour.

FAQ.Q2: How to add bidding to the comments?

A2.L1: In the upper part of the comment panel there is a button 'add bidding'.
A2.L2: This button is visible for all galleries created with BridgeBoards.com.
A2.L3: After pressing this button special bidding table and buttons appear.

FAQ.Q3: Can I use BridgeBoards.com to access all the galleries I have created?

A3.PART2: should be created and all galleries from BridgeBoards should be pinned to your account.

FAQ.Q4: Is it possible to generate galleries from all types of tournaments?

A4.L1: BridgeBoards can currently read: BBO and all types of tournaments and league games that take place in Poland.
A4.L2: Should you have any problems, please contact us

FAQ.Q5: Why I don't receive notifications about new comments to my galleries?

A5.L1: Only registered users can receive notifications.

A6.L1: Only your own comments can be deleted.
A6.L2: Additionally only the comments added by logged users can be deleted - you can't delete comment you create as 'anonymous'.
A6.L3: After placing cursor on the comment a button 'X' on the right appears - press this button to delete the comment.

FAQ.Q7: How can I get in touch with you?
